title: How Monsters Spawn in R.E.P.O. (Guide and Code deep dive)

tasks.task: Understanding the spawn mechanics of game enemies and level structures during gameplay.
subtasks: Identifying three levels of entities (Level 1, 2, 3) and their respective monsters.
Noting the probability of different monster levels spawning.
Determining the impact of a 4.6656% chance for lower-level entities to replace level 3 entities.
Recognizing the presence of monster spawn sets (e.g., 3 Animals, 3 Bowties) and their limitations.
Understanding how game level affects monster compositions (e.g., game levels 1-2 have 1 Level 1 and 1 Level 3 monster).
Examing the spawning behavior of entities after 2-5 seconds away from the truck.
Knowing the idle times for different levels (highest at Level 1 with 2-3 minutes, decreasing as level increases).
Understanding the despawn mechanism (20-40 second timer) and its impact on respawn timers.
Knowing that monsters killed by players have their respawn timer multiplied by 3 for the first 10 minutes.
Recognizing the rapid respawning of monsters (1-second timer) during the final extraction.
Understanding the strategic paths monsters take after respawning during the final extraction.
Noting the presence of a tryharding strategy involving sending a player back early.
Acknowledging the value of Shibu in providing information from the game's code.
